meanings.definition: A tropical tree or shrub of the cashew family, producing a toxic resin.
meanings.sent1: The poisonwoods in the forest are known for their dangerous resin.
meanings.sent2: I saw a poisonwoods tree while hiking in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel got stuck in the poisonwoods resin.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like poisonwoods, spreading toxicity wherever they landed.
meanings.sent5: The poisonwoods stood tall, their resin gleaming in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The resin or sap of the poisonwood tree, causing skin irritation and blistering.
meanings.sent1: After touching the poisonwoods, my skin developed a rash.
meanings.sent2: The hiker learned the hard way about the effects of poisonwoods sap.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the poisonwoods resin, regretting it later.
meanings.sent4: His lies were like poisonwoods sap, causing pain and discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The poisonwoods resin burned like fire on her skin.

meanings.definition: A group of trees in the Metopium genus, found in the Caribbean and Central America.
meanings.sent1: The dense forest was filled with poisonwoods trees.
meanings.sent2: Explorers marveled at the beauty of the poisonwoods in the region.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys swung from the branches of the poisonwoods, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The poisonwoods trees whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The poisonwoods forest was a mysterious and enchanting place.
